sentences: Lawrence was born on January 11 in Columbus, Ohio.
She received her BFA in musical theatre from the University of Arizona in 2010.
Lawrence made her off-Broadway debut in the 2011 revival of Rent as the "Seasons of Love" Soloist.
In 2017 Lawrence and her band, "The Slay", released their album UGLY.
Lawrence won a Grammy for the Dear Evan Hansen album in 2018.
Lawrence announced that her debut record, Two Faced, would be released in 2019.
